EmailTemplate.subject: DO YOU KNOW WHERE YOU’RE AIRCRAFT IS?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}},
Where exactly is your aircraft? Honeywell Datalink Airline Operations Control (AOC) Flight Tracker takes monitoring and tracking to a new level.
AOC Flight Tracker can:
- Pinpoint an aircraft’s exact location. - Monitor the health of critical onboard systems that assess aircraft movement in real time. - Let you know if the aircraft changes course unexpectedly. - Help the ground-based operations center to immediately understand the abnormal situation on the aircraft. - Provide aircraft movement information vital to identifying the nature of an emergency.
AOC Flight Tracker uses onboard sensors, the ACARS network, and Honeywell’s industry-leading Connected Aircraft capabilities. No additional aircraft hardware or software is needed and the Datalink AOC database is easily deployable with no aircraft-level certification required.
FIND OUT MORE <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Datalink_AOC.html]]>
